title: Why can we no longer search mugshots by name? Will the feature be returned to this newer format?
text:
Yes, that feature will be returned.



In the meantime, however, you can search it like this:



http://mugshots.starnewsonline.com/?s=FirstName+LastName



So, anything after s= are your search terms with + signs where you
would have spaces. See if that works for you.
